definition: to make slack as by lessening tension or firmness
details:
verb
- to make slack as by lessening tension or firmness
= example: to make slack as by lessening tension or firmness
= synonyms: remit
- to become looser or slack
= example: to become looser or slack
- to become slow or slower
= example: to become slow or slower
= synonyms: slow
- to make less active or fast
= example: to make less active or fast
= synonyms: slack
